reason: Task #41 (backlink_velocity_tracking) implementation complete. Added schema, backend queries/mutations, cron job, and frontend components.
thinking_process: Implemented complete backlink velocity tracking system. Schema adds backlinkVelocityHistory table with daily new/lost/net change tracking. Backend includes getVelocityHistory, getVelocityStats, detectVelocityAnomalies queries and saveDailyVelocity mutation. Cron job calculateDailyBacklinkVelocity runs daily at 2 AM. Frontend has BacklinkVelocityChart (composed chart with bars + line) and VelocityMetricsCards (4 metrics) integrated into Backlinks tab. Ready for testing.

how_to_test.name: Navigate to domain backlinks tab and verify UI renders
data_for_next_step: Velocity section appears below backlinks history

how_to_test.name: Manually trigger cron: npx convex run scheduler:calculateDailyBacklinkVelocity
Verify velocity data appears in charts and metrics cards
data_for_next_step: Green bars (new), red bars (lost), blue line (net change)

how_to_test.name: Check for console errors and verify all data loads correctly
data_for_next_step: Zero console errors, all queries successful
